name: swimmer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 someone who swims, especially in races, or someone who is swimming: She was a national champion swimmer. Oliver is a very strong swimmer. Some swimmers saw a shark in the sea. See
swim
More examplesFewer examplesNo US female swimmer has ever won as many medals. He became the first swimmer to qualify for six individual events.She once saved the life of a drowning swimmer.
